tool.name: Spec2Vec Model Training
tool.description: Train a Spec2Vec model for mass spectra similarity scoring
tool.command: python3 ${__tool_directory__}/spec2vec_training_wrapper.py \ --spectra_filename '$spectra_filename' \ --spectra_fileformat '$spectra_filename.ext' \ #if output_parameters.model_checkpoints --checkpoints '$output_parameters.model_checkpoints' \ #else --epochs $output_parameters.epochs \ #end if --epochs '$training_parameters.epochs' \ --vector_size '$training_parameters.vector_size' \ --alpha '$training_parameters.alpha' \ --min_alpha '$training_parameters.min_alpha' \ --window '$training_parameters.window' \ --min_count '$training_parameters.min_count' \ --sample '$training_parameters.sample' \ --seed '$training_parameters.seed' \ --sg '$training_parameters.sg_param' \ #if $training_parameters.sg_param == "0" --cbow_mean '$training_parameters.sg_param.cbow_mean' \ #end if --hs '$training_parameters.hs_param' \ #if $training_parameters.hs_param == "0" --negative '$training_parameters.hs_param.negative' \ #end if --sorted_vocab '$training_parameters.sorted_vocab' \ --batch_words '$training_parameters.batch_words' \ --shrink_windows '$training_parameters.shrink_windows' \ --trim_rule '$training_parameters.trim_rule' \ --max_final_vocab_bool '$training_parameters.trim_final_vocab.max_final_vocab_bool' \ #if $training_parameters.trim_final_vocab.max_final_vocab_bool.is_true --max_final_vocab '$training_parameters.trim_final_vocab.max_final_vocab' \ #end if --n_decimals '$training_parameters.n_decimals' \ --n_workers '$workers' \ --checkpoints '$output_parameters.model_checkpoints' \ --json_output_filename '$model_filename_json' #if $output_parameters.as_pickle.is_true --pickle_output_filename '$model_filename_pickle' #end if

param.label: Training spectra
param.name: spectra_filename
param.help: Spectra file to traing a Spec2Vec model.

param.label: Save model as Pickle file
param.name: as_pickle
param.help: Add a Pickle output besides default JSON.

param.label: Model chekpoints
param.name: is_true
param.help: Epochs after which to save a model.

param.label: Number of training epochs with checkpoints
param.name: epochs
param.help: Comma-separated epoch numbers after which to save a model. The highest number will be used as a total number of epochs for training.

param.label: Number of training epochs
param.name: epochs
param.help: Number of epochs to train the model.

param.label: Vector size
param.name: vector_size
param.help: Dimensionality of the feature vectors (i.e., into how many dimensions to encode each mass spectrum.

param.label: Alpha
param.name: alpha
param.help: The initial learning rate.

param.label: Minimum Alpha
param.name: min_alpha
param.help: Learning rate will linearly drop to this value as training progresses.

param.label: Window
param.name: window
param.help: The maximum distance between the current and predicted peak within a spectrum.

param.label: Minimum peak count
param.name: min_count
param.help: Ignores all peaks with total frequency lower than this.

param.label: Sample
param.name: sample
param.help: The threshold for configuring which higher-frequency peaks are randomly downsampled.

param.label: Seed
param.name: seed
param.help: A seed for model reproducibility.

param.label: Word-Embedding type
param.name: sg
param.help: Embedding type: Skip-gram or Continuous Bag of Words

param.label: CBOW mean
param.name: cbow_mean
param.help: Whether to use the sum of the context word vectors or their mean.

param.label: Last Layer Activation
param.name: hs
param.help: Activation function of the last layer of the neural network.

param.label: Negative Samples
param.name: negative
param.help: If > 0, negative sampling will be used, this value specifies how many 'negative' examples should be drawn (usually between 5-20). If set to 0, no negative sampling is used.

param.label: Sort the vocabulary of spectra
param.name: sorted_vocab
param.help: If true, sort the vocabulary by descending frequency before assigning word indexes.

param.label: Batch size
param.name: batch_words
param.help: Target size (in words) for batches of examples passed to worker threads (and thus cython routines). Larger batches will be passed if individual texts are longer than 10000 words, but the standard cython code truncates to that maximum.

param.label: Shrink windows
param.name: shrink_windows
param.help: If true, the input sentence will be truncated to the window size.

param.label: Trim rule
param.name: trim_rule
param.help: A callable that accepts a dict of (word, count) pairs and returns either None (discard), or a modified version of the dict (some words may be removed, or the counts may be reduced). Used to discard uncommon words or modify their counts.

param.label: Maximum unique words in the spectral vocabulary
param.name: max_final_vocab_bool
param.help: Limits the RAM during vocabulary building; if there are more unique words than this, then prune the infrequent ones. Set to None for no limit (default).

param.label: Number of decimals to round m/z values
param.name: n_decimals
param.help: Rounds peak position to this number of decimals.
